description:
A lightweight line for getting in full-length rappels or to rig a haul line. Rapping with different diameter ropes is an advanced climbing skill, so make sure you have proper training for safe use.

  • 75m length
  • 6mm diameter
  • Nylon core protected by a Technora sheath is highly cut- and abrasion-resistant
  • Warning: It's not a dynamic rope. Don't use it for climbing. Don't lead with it. Don't use it for top roping
  • Another warning: Use caution when rappelling with two different diameter ropes
name: Sterling Rope TRC 6mm Tag Line
